net.gree.asdk.api
Class ModeratedText

java.lang.Object
  net.gree.asdk.api.ModeratedText

public class ModeratedText
extends java.lang.Object

Implements GREE ModeratedText / Inspection API. This API allows an app to submit words and phrases to the GREE service for review and approval according to terms of service. This allows applications to screen user input for appropriateness. Processing can be automated or manually reviewed, check service documentation for details.

Author:
GREE, Inc.

loadFromLocalCache

public static void loadFromLocalCache(boolean refresh,
                                      ModeratedText.ModeratedTextListener listener)
Loads one or more ModeratedText objects from this device's local cache. If you use true as the refresh parameter then the listener will be called when the value have been updated from the server.

Parameters:
refresh - Should the data be refreshed against the server values?
listener - the listener to receive the ModeratedText

text - to replace the existing value on the server.
